name: pm4.71d
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wb(w1, wa(w1, w2)), wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wb(wi(w1, w2), wb(w1, wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wb(wi(w1, w2), wb(w1, wa(w1, w2)))

comment: Deduction converting an implication to a biconditional with conjunction. Deduction from Theorem *4.71 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
